Html:
Hi,

How to set currency format (e.i. "z≈Ç", Polish zloty) for a cell?

Thanks

In Excel itself, you'd use a currency format mask such as '#,##0 [$zl-415]'

I've not tried it in PHPExcel, but have a go using:
$PHPExcelObject->getActiveSheet()->getStyle($cell)->getNumberFormat()->setFormatCode('#,##0 [$zl-415]');

Let us know whether it works or not.
